name: Employee Of The Month (Alpha)
description:
Employee Of The Month (Alpha)

A fun indie style game steal your co workers supplies and become employee of the month! Don't get Caught though they tend to get super cranky when you don't give them their stuff back!

Early access game!!!

Final Student Project!

Game is not finished and is buggy, but will be fixed and updated over time!

Thank you for everyone's support, and a special thank you to the team that made this happen!
